infos.value: ...Hey, did you hear?
Hear what?
I heard a report from the shinobi earlier.
The mangy lions are on their way here, it seems.
What's become of Wezette?
Apparently, Leonis dissolved their alliance with Wezette. They now intend to ally themselves with Hourne.
It's not worth fretting over an alliance made in such haste.
On the contrary, Lord Sadali may well look past Hourne's betrayal.
Because in the end, we have Machérie.
And it seems that Mont, the first-born prince of Leonis, is head over heels for her.
This should get interesting. Heh heh heh.
...Quite the intricate web we've got woven here, I see.
But what is this about Prince Mont having fallen for Machérie!? Give me a break!
I, Lord Camillo, shall be the one to liberate Machérie.
And when I do, she will surely come to see who the superior man is.
Oh, my prince has arrived on his white steed to free me from the clutches of evil—wait, who are you?
Sorry to keep you waiting, Machérie.
Lord Camillo... You took your time getting here.
Forgive me, sweet princess.
I have been pining for you since last we met, waiting for you to reach me... Do you know how that feels?
I do. Because I yearned to see you, too.
...Truly?
Truly. Because I—
The next chapter of your little play is quite dramatic.
S-silence!
Come on, let's hurry up and save Machérie!
